entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 9 with temperature rising to 13 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers overnight with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this evening then light before morning. Low 9 with temperature rising to 13 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or thunderstorms. High 19 except 13 near Lake Erie.
entry.summary: Showers or thunderstorms. Local amount 10 to 20 mm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 19 except 13 near Lake Erie. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers ending near midnight then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening. Local amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
